trans-unit.source: Implements a type converter for <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref> objects, which deliberately have no type conversion pathways.
trans-unit.target: 型コンバーターを実装する<xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref>オブジェクト、型変換の経路が意図的にありません。

trans-unit.source: The type converter enforces and reports that behavior.
trans-unit.target: 型コンバーターは、強制し、その動作を報告します。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>型が値に変換する型コンバーターの経路を使用しないでください</xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>。

trans-unit.source: You should use markup extensions instead.
trans-unit.target: 代わりに、マークアップ拡張機能を使用する必要があります。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: このため、<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>と<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>メソッドは常に返す`false`</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29></xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>と<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29>メソッドは常に例外をスローします</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29></xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>。

trans-unit.source: The exceptions might possibly report invalid input, but even input that is considered valid will result in <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: おそらく、無効な入力をレポートも可能性があります例外<xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>有効と見なされますの入力になります

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: ## XAML テキストの使用方法

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 新しいインスタンスを初期化、 <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter"> </xref>クラスです。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: インスタンスに指定した型のオブジェクトを変換できるかどうかを判断<xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"> </xref>、指定したコンテキストを使用します。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 常に返します<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>型 (使用すべきマークアップ拡張機能の代わりに) 値を変換する型コンバーターの経路を使用しないでください</xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the CanConvertFrom and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: このため、CanConvertFrom と<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>メソッドは常に返す`false`</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>と<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29>メソッドは常に例外をスローします</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29></xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>。

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: このコンバーターの呼び出される環境に関する情報を提供する書式指定コンテキスト。

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 変換の評価対象の型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>すべての場合。

trans-unit.source: sourceType is .
trans-unit.target: sourceTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref> can be converted to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: インスタンスかどうかを決定<xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref>指定したコンテキストを使用して、指定された型に変換することができます。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 常に返します<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>型 (使用すべきマークアップ拡張機能の代わりに) 値を変換する型コンバーターの経路を使用しないでください</xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and CanConvertTo methods always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: このため、 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>CanConvertTo メソッドは常に返すと`false`</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>と<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29>メソッドは常に例外をスローします</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29></xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>。
